name: Movement Pill
description:
Movement Pill is a puzzle game made in 7 days for the VimJam. The objective is to get from point A from point B, walking a path that can be played in reverse and get you back from point B to point A. The only problem is that you have a limited ammount of moves you can make, but fear not! You can gain more moves by eating pills you find in the levels.

Play time

There are 8 levels in total, for an experience that can around 30 minutes.

Have fun!

gillo04
